title: Angel: The End
description: This is the end, beautiful friend! After years of fighting to protect his friends and the citizens of Los Angeles from the demonic hordes which populate this and other dimensions, Angel must say goodbye. Elaborate plans and selfless acts have come and gone, and now IDW presents the hardcover collection of Angel's final three volumes: Immortality for Dummies, The Crown Prince Syndrome, and The Wolf, The Ram, and The Heart into one glorious collection, including the never-before-collected Angel Yearbook.
author: Bill Willingham
